column4: i tried ubuntu on a dell dimension e521 and it says i need drivers that are not free, i have never heard of that, but i am mainly a windows user until now, what's the deal?
That will probably be your wifi drivers. Provided it works, dont worry about it. It just means the wifi driver is proprietary instead of open source
my video was only 800 x 600 , i figured it was that
Could be but I would be surprised.
